title: Baby Bib
description: neck fasteners missing; overall satin stitch; stylized people, symmetrically interspersed with tiny cross stitch patterns on blue bib; red, green, orange, white; loops at sides; commercial floral print lining
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
